summary: This document is an email update regarding outstanding securities for Southern Trust Co., Inc., detailing specific securities to be delivered to Deutsche Bank. It includes financial figures and mentions several individuals involved in the communication.

keyFacts: The email provides an update on outstanding securities for Southern Trust Co., Inc.
Securities are to be delivered to Deutsche Bank on 10/16/13.
Janet Young is the Vice President at J.P. Morgan and is the sender of the email.
The email mentions specific financial figures related to securities.
The email is marked confidential and includes disclaimers regarding the information.
